content: this is a free pattern you may use the pattern and product how you like but please make credit for where credit is due there is a designer who made this pattern and she likes to be recognized for her hard work you may find that is pattern is very similar to another pattern of mine that is because it is you can find my other poinsettia pattern here link text 1 1 http //crochetvolution com/winter-2013/poinsettia-jar-cozy i would call this pattern an intermediate pattern but if you know the basic stitches and you have worked with string then it should be no problem for you
